question: Which of the following was the reason to establish Liberalised Remittance Scheme?
option1: to permit citizens of India to transfer funds abroad for permitted current or capital account transactions
option2: to permit foreigners to transfer funds abroad for permitted current or capital account transactions
option3: to permit NRI to transfer funds to India for permitted current or capital account transactions
answer: to permit citizens of India to transfer funds abroad for permitted current or capital account transactions
